title: E-commerce Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a resourceful and motivated virtual assistant with solid experience in e-commerce, dropshipping, and digital marketing to help build and scale our yoga-focused online brand. If you’ve worked with platforms like Shopify, Amazon, Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop, or Etsy, and understand how to manage sales, content, and marketing in a wellness-focused space — we want to hear from you.

This role requires independent thinking, strong online business experience, and the ability to grow a brand from the ground up in a niche market.
Your Key Responsibilities: 

E-Commerce & Dropshipping Management
- Manage product listings, pricing, inventory updates, and order fulfillment on platforms like Shopify, Shopee, Amazon, or TikTok Shop
- Coordinate with suppliers, follow up on shipments, and track delivery timelines
- Monitor product performance and make suggestions to optimize conversions
- Handle product research and recommend items suitable for a yoga and wellness audience

Sales & Marketing Support
- Create and schedule product promotions, discount campaigns, and social media sales pushes
- Research competitor pricing and marketing strategies in the yoga/eco-products niche
- Assist with lead generation and follow-ups for bulk orders or partnerships
- Maintain simple weekly performance reports (sales, traffic, ROI, etc.)

Content Coordination
- Work with our graphic designer to plan email campaigns, ads, and product visuals
- Draft product descriptions, campaign text, and marketing copy as needed
- Suggest ideas for video content, product education, or community-building
- Help manage and update social media platforms and basic paid ad campaigns
Requirements
- 1–3 years experience in dropshipping, e-commerce, or online brand management
- Familiarity with platforms such as Shopify, Lazada, Shopee, TikTok Shop, or Amazon
- Solid understanding of e-commerce sales funnels, inventory coordination, and basic logistics
- Good communication skills in English (bonus if you can write short copy or ads)
- Comfortable working independently, meeting deadlines, and managing multiple tasks
- Strong attention to detail, self-motivated, and results-driven

Bonus Skills (Not Mandatory)
- Background in yoga, wellness, or health-related products
- Experience in influencer marketing or community management
- Familiarity with tools like Canva, Klaviyo, Mailchimp, or Meta Ads 

Please apply with following details: 
1. Your detailed CV/resume, including relevant e-commerce or dropshipping experience
2. A portfolio or examples of online stores or product listings you’ve managed
3. A short video (2–3 minutes) introducing yourself – tell us who you are, your experience in e-commerce, and why you're excited about working with a yoga-focused brand

Make sure your application includes all three parts. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a video interview.

Best wishes
